title: Share This Mother's Day Prayer With Your...
text:
By Mary Fairchild Updated April 18, 2016 . 
I wrote this Mother's Day prayer for my mom. As Christians, many of us feel a similar love and thankfulness for our mothers, and on Mother's Day we're looking for just the right way to express what's in our hearts. If these words touch you and convey your sentiments, you're welcome to share this prayer with your special mom. Mother's Day Prayer 
My mom, I love herAnd that's why I prayNot just today on this Mother's Day 
But with each remembranceOf the love she's expressedMy thankfulness to the Lord I've professed 
For my life beganIn a warm and safe placeThen grew more secure in Mom's tender embrace 
When I was littleShe taught me to crawlThen to walk and run, and get up when I fall 
Nurtured and cared forShe raised me to standLifted, supported, by her loving hand 
She believed in meNothing was impossible for me, it seemed 
It was her exampleTo the life in Christ I know today 
My mom, I love herOn this Mother's DayShe's the reason I'm taking this moment to pray 
My mom, I love herLet her know, dear LordPlease bless her with the most abundant reward 
-- Mary Fairchild
